adrFormatAddress: 1020 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

editorialSummary.text: Fast-food chain offering Mexican fare, including design-your-own burritos, tacos & bowls.

originalText.text: This used to be my favorite chipotle in Manhattan (tried 10+ locations) but not anymore. They seem to lack staff on Saturdays where there is always a heavy Spanish/black man serving food for customers (he seems to be a cook but has to be a food preparer because they don't have any now) . He's so unhygienic and disgusting. He never changes his gloves and wears them touching everything then grab your rice directly eww. I had the last meal there and almost puked ðŸ¤¢ thinking about his dirty hands grabbing my rice and lettuce, a moment before he was rubbing his face and poking his nose with them

originalText.text: I've visited this location quite a few times and  decided to do this review now because my last visit prompted me to do so.. This particular location is small yet long with plenty of seating, has customer restrooms, a wheelchair accessible entrance, and music playing as you dine. Tables and Chairs may be found with crumbs, garbage, and left overs from the last person seated which can only mean the staff hasn't noticed or are not eager to clean the tables out as soon as possible for whatever reason.....so at times you may find yourself cleaning and clearing your table if theres no other available. Trash cans are often found over flowing leaving customers to continue piling the trash. The staff is straight foward in taking your order but seem pretty youung and theres plenty of them. The food has been great no complaints there, they just have to tidy up the place more often. Thanks and Enjoy.

originalText.text: The girl at the register, Luissanna, I guess doesn't speak English so she misunderstood me when I asked for a water cup and charged me for a large drink, which is fine. So she called over another girl on the side and had her refund me for the large drink but when I was explaining to the girl who came over about the situation and said that I was looking for a water cup and not a large soda, she was  just busy giving me a refund and told me that I'm all good while giving me the refund receipt without giving me the water cup. Also, Luissana kept saying that she heard LARGE and that's why she charged me for the drink but I'm not sure how water cup sounds like a large cup but sure. Like hello? I just left because I didnt feel like fighting over a free water cup but it's just the lack of customer service and the lack of common sense from the employees that really annoyed me the most.
